description: This is a subset of http://iow.csc.fi/model/att that defines API to describe Research Data Catalogs in METAX
title: Metax Research Data Catalogs

Catalog.title: Research Data Catalog
Catalog.description: A curated collection of metadata about datasets

catalog_json.title: Catalog JSON
catalog_json.description: The actual fields of the data catalog. Detailed in http://iow.csc.fi/model/mdc/Catalog/

catalog_record_group_edit.title: Editor group
catalog_record_group_edit.description: Comma-separated list of groups which are allowed to edit catalog records in the catalog.

catalog_record_group_create.title: Creator group
catalog_record_group_create.description: Comma-separated list of groups which are allowed to add new catalog records to the catalog.

date_modified.title: Date Modified
date_modified.description: Date on which the resource was changed.

user_modified.title: Modified by user id
user_modified.description: User id of the person who last edited this record

date_created.title: Date Created
date_created.description: Date of creation of the resource. Can't be updated once set.

user_created.title: Created by user id
user_created.description: User id of the person who created this record. Can't be updated once set.

service_created.description: Service name who created this resource.

service_modified.description: Service name who last modified this resource.

date_removed.title: Date removed
date_removed.description: Date of removal of the resource. Can't be updated once set
